Title(s): ‘Ane devoit orisoun till our Lady callit Aue cuius concepcio’
Subjects: Virgin Mary, prayers to; prayers, to Virgin Mary
_description: ‘Ane devoit orisoun till our Lady callit Aue cuius concepcio’ — twenty-two irregular lines

BLAru285.First Lines: HAIll mary quhais concepciounwas cause of our mirthe and consolacioun…
BLAru285.Last Lines: …Pray for ws lade euemairto do sa heir we may cum þair
BLAru285.Attributed Title: Ane deuoit orisoun till our lady callit aue cuius concepcio (rubric, f. 188v)
